sentences.en: Another is to intenerate the input vectors by hyperbola tangent function.
sentences.cn: 二是采用双曲线正切函数柔化输入矢量.

sentences.en: Both of approaching and returning movements are along the tangent of the circle.
sentences.cn: 绕转之后移动方向为自南向北，也是沿圆周的切线运动。

sentences.en: Computes the arc tangent ( in radians ) of the specified argument.
sentences.cn: 计算指定参数的反正切 ( 按弧度 ).

sentences.en: Construct an animation showing the tangent sweeping out the interior of astroid.
sentences.cn: 建构一动态绘图:展示星状线的切线所有扫掠过的内部轨迹.

sentences.en: CORDIC algorithm with the two parameters arc tangent.
sentences.cn: 用CORDIC算法实现的2参数反正切.

sentences.en: Does the Cross Member remain tangent to the Vertical Member?
sentences.cn: 水平交叉部分是否和垂直部分保持相切?

sentences.en: Don't fly off at a tangent, stick to the subject.
sentences.cn: 紧扣主题,不要跑野马.

sentences.en: Drag to add two arcs with adjustable radii and connecting tangent lines.
sentences.cn: 拖动此形状,可添加具有可调半径和相连切线的两条弧线.

sentences.en: Expression to compute the arc tangent of ( float ).
sentences.cn: 要计算反正切的表达式 ( 浮点小数型 ).

sentences.en: Given a triangle, construct the deltoid tangent to its sides.
sentences.cn: 给定三角形, 作三角线与其三边相切.

sentences.en: If we were moving on the tangent plane, this would be an actual equality.
sentences.cn: 如果我们在切平面上移动,这将会是一个真正的等式。

sentences.en: If you want strict equalities in approximations means that we replace the function by its tangent approximation.
sentences.cn: 如果你想要严格的近似等式,那就意味着我们要用切线逼近来取代原函数。

sentences.en: It's not easy to follow her thought because she's always going off at a tangent.
sentences.cn: 要跟上她的思路并非易事,因为她老是突然扯到题外去.

sentences.en: Of a dielectric the product of dielectric constant and the tangent of its dielectric loss angle; a measure of the heating effect which occurs in dielectrics.
sentences.cn: 对于电介质来说，它是介电常数和介质损耗角的正切的乘积，这是对出现在电介质中的热效应的量度。

sentences.en: Parallax mapping uses the concept of tangent space in the same manner.
sentences.cn: 视差贴图同样使用了这样的切线空间的概念.

sentences.en: Technical analysis is usually divided into five categories: Indicator category, tangent category.
sentences.cn: 通常技术分析分为五类: 指标类, 切线类.

sentences.en: The application of tangent - initial - displacement method in solving fabrication geometry is introduced.
sentences.cn: 介绍了切线初始位移法在求解制造线形中的应用.

sentences.en: The conversation went off at a tangent.
sentences.cn: 交谈突然偏离了正题。

sentences.en: The setting of road shape instruction along highway in mountain area was discussed using tangent offset method in road survey.
sentences.cn: 运用公路测量学上的切线支距法对线形诱导标在山区高速公路的设置进行了探讨。

sentences.en: The tangent may be used to find the direction.
sentences.cn: 这方向也可用正切求得.

words.tran_cn: [数] 切线的，[数] 正切的；离题的，扯远的
[数]切线的，相切的；接触的；离题的

phrases.tran_cn: 切线模量，切线模数；正切模量；地基应力和变形切线模量

trans.tran_cn: 切线的，相切的；接触的；离题的
<数>正切，突然转移话题，突兀的转向，（铁路或道路的）直线区间
trans.tran_en: a straight line that touches the outside of a curve but does not cut across it
